message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,500?
